sentences.en: And , looking in thine eyes, I overturn.
sentences.cn: 眼望着你, 我把灰撒在你脚下.

sentences.en: For design of overturn - resistant equipment with vertical energy dissipation, a steel - lead mixed damper is designed.
sentences.cn: 为了设计具有竖向耗能能力的 抗 倾覆装置, 介绍了一种钢铅组合耗能器.

sentences.en: For that dream to remain alive, Liverpool must overturn a 1 - 0 first - leg deficit against Atletico Madrid.
sentences.cn: 要实现这个目标, 利物浦必须挽回首回合1-0对马德里竞技的劣势.

sentences.en: He is asking the Sedgwick County trial court to overturn the law.
sentences.cn: 他要求Sedgwick县审判法庭推翻该法律.

sentences.en: His car overturned, trapping him inside.
sentences.cn: 他的汽车发生侧翻，把他困在了里面。

sentences.en: Horrified commuters saw the lorry veer across the motorway and overturn.
sentences.cn: 惊恐万分的通勤者们看见那辆卡车突然冲向高速公路另一侧，接着翻倒在地。

sentences.en: I _ 7 is amended in this paper . When a image overturn 180� �, its value is contrariety.
sentences.cn: 文中修改了第7个矩不变量I7,对翻转180°后的图像, 其值保持不变,符号刚好相反.

sentences.en: I will overturn royal thrones and shatter the power of the foreign kingdoms.
sentences.cn: 22我必倾覆列国的宝座,除灭列邦的势力,并倾覆战车,和坐在其上的.

sentences.en: I will overturn the pies as required.
sentences.cn: 我将按照要求把馅饼翻个个儿.

sentences.en: It will submerge nearby towns and overturn the mountains in its course.
sentences.cn: 它会在途中淹没了城镇,倾覆了山脉.

sentences.en: Leslie jumped to her feet, overturning her chair.
sentences.cn: 莱斯莉一跃而起，碰倒了椅子。

sentences.en: Since then, economists have vied with each other to overturn this orthodoxy.
sentences.cn: 自此之后, 经济学家就开始争相颠覆这个传统理论.

sentences.en: Their cunning plot is to overturn our government . It is of the thinnest.
sentences.cn: 他们的阴谋是想翻天. 这是显而易见的.

sentences.en: This boat is easy to overturn because its shape is unreasonable.
sentences.cn: 这只船容易颠覆,因为它造型不合理.

sentences.en: Three studies the current issue of the New England Journal of Medicine overturn that dogma.
sentences.cn: 最新一期的新英格兰医学杂志中的三项研究推翻了以上的教条主义.

sentences.en: We saw the canoe overturn, throwing its passengers into the water.
sentences.cn: 我们看到独木舟倾覆了, 把上面的乘客掀入水中.

sentences.en: When wasteful war shall statues overturn, And Broils root out the work of masonry.
sentences.cn: 当着残暴的战争把铜像推翻, 或内讧把城池荡成一片废墟.

trans.tran_en: if you overturn something, or if it overturns, it turns upside down or falls over on its side

trans.tran_cn: 倾覆， 翻转， 翻倒
trans.tran_en: if you overturn something, or if it overturns, it turns upside down or falls over on its side

trans.tran_cn: 使垮台，推翻，撤销（判决等）
trans.tran_en: if you overturn something, or if it overturns, it turns upside down or falls over on its side
